title: Olympiacos hooligans storm the pitch and attack Bayern Munich fans in youth game
text:
Olympiacos' UEFA Youth League clash with Bayern Munich was suspended on Tuesday by a group of home ultras armed with bats.

Four fans were injured as the game was halted in the 84th minute when around 50 masked Olympiacos ultras launched flares and sticks from the stands onto the pitch.

In horrifying scenes the hooded figures stormed the pitch and attacked defenceless opposition supporters in a brutal bid to get the game called off.

Olympiacos ultras armed with sticks invaded the pitch in a UEFA Youth League game

The game was called to a halt in the 84th minute with Olympiacos trailing 4-0

Four Bayern Munich fans were injured as the game in Athens ended in bloody scenes

Η στιγμή της εισβολής των κουκουλοφόρων στο παιχνίδι των νέων μεταξύ Ολυμπιακού και Μπάγερν #olyfcb #ChampionsLeague pic.twitter.com/cJNeuZWQrz — tsibos (@tsibos10) October 22, 2019

The referee called an immediate stop to the game with the German visitors 4-0 up.

The game was interrupted for 25, but they weren't to be perturbed in their effort to finish the match.

When told to resume the match they instead whiled away the final few minutes by setting up a form of rondo in the centre circle.

Joshua Zirkzee scored a hat-trick and Lasse Gunther struck the other as Bayern dominated the match.

A supporter has his head wrapped in a bandage after incident in Tuesday night's game

A woman leads her child to safety as the ugly scenes unfold on the pitch in Athens

The two teams set up a form of rondo in the centre circle to while away the final few minutes

En el fútbol griego pasan muchas cosas anómalas.

El partido de la UEFA youth league entre Olympiacos y Bayern de Múnich nos deja un nuevo episodio pic.twitter.com/PndcPTlrGu — Jorge M.L. (Ojeando la B) (@OjeandoLaB) October 22, 2019

Olympiacos are facing the possibility of a penalty or fine for the indiscretions of their supporters.

According to Sport.24 the perpetrators entered the stadium through a back door that leads to a parking lot, meaning that they could circumvent security.

The two sides face eachother later on Tuesday in the Champions League group stage.
description: Four fans were injured as the game was halted in the 84th minute when the Olympiacos ultras launched flares and sticks from the stands onto the pitch.
